msg: OAK-1757: Oak eats too many CPU cycles when idle Make the Fast clock update interval configurable for testing purposes Update test case to judge drift against correct clock granularity

author: stsp
msg: Add a new "i" option to the interactive text conflict prompt which
"m": use external merge tool if configured, or internal one if not
This gives users full control over which merge tool is run.
Only the "m" option is displayed at the initial prompt,
since this is what we expect most people will want to use.
The other options are shown in the long help text selected
Tweak description of "l" option for consistency.
